title: What is an HVAC Installer (Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning Installer)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many homeowners don't realize this, but the most important factor into your new HVAC installation isn't the brand, but it is WHO installs your system. The right contractor can install a system that when installed properly can significantly reduce your bills. We are Congressional Heating and Air Conditioning who specializes in Residential and Commercial heating and cooling systems, including Solar panel installation. Our installation crews are friendly, courteous and we explain the entire process, making you fully aware on what you could expect in your system. Congressional Heating and Air conditioning offers maintenance agreements at a reasonable price and always sends a reminder to schedule an appointment to assure that our system is operating correctly. Congressional Heating & Air Conditioning provides HVAC Maintenance, Repairs, Installation and Replacement services in Maryland. We service throughout Montgomery County Maryland.

It is a person who has been trained and certified to install heating, ventilating, and air conditioning systems in homes and/or commercial buildings. Since these systems can and frequently do kill people when they are installed improperly, the job of HVAC installer is an important one. To take one example, combustion furnaces produce carbon monoxide which must be vented to the outside of your house. If that exhaust ends up in the air you breathe because the installer did the duct work improperly, you and everyone under your roof could very well not wake up in the morning.
